basics.name: Bui Hoang Anh
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software Engineer with 6+ years of experience across diverse technologies and languages. Proficient in Object-Oriented Analysis and Design, System Design, Database Architecture, with strong infrastructure knowledge. Passionate about continuous learning and innovation, I thrive on implementing new solutions to enhance product quality and user experience. A collaborative problem-solver who balances technical excellence with business objectives.

highlights.description: Work as devops, build the infrastructure as code for the new version. Ensure the system is stable and scalable, able to handle the growth of the company
Work across engineering teams to resolve problems, consult solution for other team members to improve the product

work.summary: Ringkas is a financial technology (fintech) company dedicated to simplifying and expanding access to home financing across Southeast Asia. By leveraging digital tools and data-driven solutions, Ringkas connects aspiring homeowners with financial institutions and streamlines the mortgage application process. The company's mission is to increase financial inclusion and make homeownership more accessible, transparent, and efficient.
work.name: Ringkas

projects.name: CRM
projects.summary: A CRM system for managing customer data and interactions, support digitalize the process of applying for a home loan

highlights.description: One of core member who build the whole system from scratch, from communication with other departments as well as external parties to architecture design and implementation
Ensure system is stable and scalable, able to handle the growth of the company, setup operation process for system on cloud
Build the first version of STP (Straight Through Processing) system, helping claim team to decrease the number of claim that need to be processed manually

work.summary: Papaya Insurtech is a Vietnam-based fintech company founded in 2018, specializing in digital solutions for life and health insurance. As the country's first lightweight, scalable digital third-party administrator (TPA), Papaya streamlines insurance processes through a digitized platform that connects directly with insurance companies and incorporates automatic fraud detection functionalities.
work.name: Papaya Insurtech

projects.name: Claim Management System
projects.summary: An internal system supporting the claim team to serve TPA service to insurance companies as well their insureds

projects.name: STP (Straight Through Processing)
projects.summary: An automation system for processing insurance claims. This system automates the process of receiving, processing, and instant payment of claims for insurance companies

highlights.description: Communicate with customers and teammates to clarify the requirement
Maintain and develop new feature for main web application
Maintain and develop multiple Office add-ins for Microsoft Word and Microsoft Outlook
Build a VSTO extension for Outlook desktop using WPF and setup an installer for it

work.summary: A legal case management system built exclusively with Microsoft 365 to provide all the intelligence and methods for managing the life cycle of a Case / Matter for lawyer
work.name: iDealogic

projects.name: Thread Legal
projects.summary: A legal case management system built exclusively with Microsoft 365 to provide all the intelligence and methods for managing the life cycle of a Case / Matter for lawyer

projects.name: Automation lock through face recognition
projects.description: An IoT system uses face recognition to automatically unlock a door when an authorized person is in front of it
